  • Method Details

    • newCourier

      public boolean newCourier​(java.lang.String strName, java.lang.String strEmail, java.lang.Integer intNIF, java.lang.String strIBAN, java.lang.String strPharmacyEmail)
      The method receives Courier's name, email, nif, iban and pharmacy's email. Validates the input recieved and gets the Pharmacy through the email provided and creates a new Courier's instance. The method returns the validation of the operation. True if the data is correct and created and false if it's not.
      Parameters:
      strName - Courier's name.
      strEmail - Courier's email.
      intNIF - Courier's nif.
      strIBAN - Courier's iban.
      strPharmacyEmail - Pharmacy's email that the Courier belongs to.

    • registersCourier

      public boolean registersCourier()
      The method adds the instance of Courier to the DataBase.

    • validateInput

      public boolean validateInput​(java.lang.String strName, java.lang.String strEmail, java.lang.Integer intNIF, java.lang.String strIBAN, java.lang.String strPharmacyEmail)
      Validates the input information regarding a Courier
      Parameters:
      strName - Courier's name.
      strEmail - Courier's email.
      intNIF - Courier's nif.
      strIBAN - Courier's iban.
      strPharmacyEmail - Pharmacy's email that the Courier belongs to.
      Returns:
      True if input is valid, false if otherwise.
